meanings.sent1: The toy car looked chintzier than the real one.
meanings.sent2: The old phone felt chintzier compared to the new model.
meanings.sent3: The fake crown looked chintzier than the shiny plastic sword.
meanings.sent4: Her imitation jewelry was chintzier than a piece of foil.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out shoes were chintzier than a pair of paper slippers.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of style or taste
meanings.sent1: His outfit was chintzier than a clown's costume.
meanings.sent2: The room's decorations appeared chintzier after the party.
meanings.sent3: The mismatched socks made his outfit look even chintzier.
meanings.sent4: The neon sign made the restaurant look chintzier than a fast-food joint.
meanings.sent5: Her attempt at painting the wall was chintzier than a child's finger painting.

meanings.sent1: The plastic flowers looked chintzier than real ones.
meanings.sent2: The fake gold watch seemed chintzier under the light.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations made the room look chintzier than a dollar store.
meanings.sent4: The knock-off designer bag was chintzier than a plastic grocery bag.
meanings.sent5: The poorly made costume was chintzier than a Halloween store prop.
